name: dingleup-load-tests
description: K6 load testing suite for DingleUP!

scripts.test:small: k6 run -e TARGET_VUS=500 -e RAMP_UP_DURATION=60s -e HOLD_DURATION=120s game-load-test.js
scripts.test:medium: k6 run -e TARGET_VUS=5000 -e RAMP_UP_DURATION=180s -e HOLD_DURATION=300s game-load-test.js
scripts.test:large: k6 run -e TARGET_VUS=25000 -e RAMP_UP_DURATION=300s -e HOLD_DURATION=180s game-load-test.js
